# Make Blur

> Make Blur is a free iOS photo editing application that allows users to blur backgrounds in photos with multiple blur effects including motion blur, gaussian blur, ghosting, pixelate, hexagonal, and crystalize.

## Key Facts

- Downloads: 10,000+
- Rating: 4.5 stars (10+ reviews)
- Platform: iOS 15+
- Price: Free
- Blur Effects: 6 types (Motion Blur, Gaussian Blur, Ghosting, Pixelate, Hexagonal, Crystalize)
- Key Feature: Auto-detect background
- App Store ID: 6749166426

## Main Sections

- Features: Background blur, photo blur, image blur with multiple effects
- How It Works: 3-step process to blur backgrounds on iPhone
- Blur Types: 6 different blur effects available
- FAQ: Common questions about blurring backgrounds on iPhone

## Contact

- Website: https://makeblur.com
- App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/id6749166426
